name: Metal Detecting Simulator
description:
2D platformer with a view from the top. In the game you have to buy equipment to search for various items. Metal detectors, shovels, will help you in this. You come to the new land, you need to buy land and start searching for gold and coins, as well you will come across junk. All these things you can sell at the local store. There is also not expensive hotel, where you can rest. There is not a big store with tools. Your zacha find a unique artifact and become the most popular treasure hunter.

Also, I want to draw attention, generators and lamps are selected mouse.

Controls:
WASD - control
1,2 - shovel, metal detector
